snippet: The publisher OR Books announced on Sunday that it had acquired “Cypherpunks,” a new book about freedom and the Internet by Julian Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks.
abstract: Publisher OR Books announces that it has acquired Cypherpunks, a book about freedom and the Internet by WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange; book will go on sale in November 2012 in paperback and as an e-book.
lead_paragraph: The publisher OR Books announced on Sunday that it had acquired “Cypherpunks,” a new book about freedom and the Internet by Julian Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks.
